statements: SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date, location FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = 2;
SELECT description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT reported_by, incident_type, location, incident_date FROM incident_reports WHERE location LIKE '%City%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Theft' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_type, location FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY location ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date, reported_by FROM incident_reports WHERE location LIKE '%City%' AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_date, location, reported_by FROM incident_reports WHERE reported_by = 'John Doe' OR reported_by = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY incident_date DESC, location ASC;

SELECT incident_id, incident_date, reported_by FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type IN ('Vandalism', 'Assault', 'Fraud') AND (location = 'Street A' OR location = 'Street B') ORDER BY reported_by DESC, incident_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT incident_id, location FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = 123;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM incident_reports ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incident_reports WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY incident_id ASC;

SELECT security_events.event_id, security_events.event_type, incident_reports.location FROM security_events JOIN incident_reports ON security_events.incident_id = incident_reports.incident_id WHERE incident_reports.location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT MAX(timestamp), location FROM incident_reports GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(incident_id) > 1;
SELECT AVG(incident_id) AS avg_incident_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reports FROM incident_reports WHERE location IN ('Chicago', 'Houston') GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_date, incident_type FROM incident_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT location, description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_type = 'Theft';
SELECT * FROM security_measures WHERE measure_category = 'Access Control' ORDER BY measure_name;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description FROM security_measures ORDER BY measure_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT report_id, incident_type, location FROM incident_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM incident_reports;

SELECT report_id, incident_type, location, measure_name FROM incident_reports JOIN analytics ON incident_reports.report_id = analytics.report_id JOIN security_measures ON analytics.measure_id = security_measures.measure_id;
SELECT report_id, analysis_result FROM analytics WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%threat%'
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level > 3;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE incident_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender FROM Suspects WHERE suspect_id = 3;
SELECT camera_id, installation_date, camera_model FROM SecurityCameras WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level = 5;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM IncidentReports WHERE security_level > 3;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SecurityCameras WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT suspect_name, age, gender, description FROM Suspects WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM incident_reports;
SELECT location, description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = 123;
SELECT name, gender, age FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT location, status FROM security_cameras ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT name, department, hire_date FROM security_officers WHERE department = 'Security';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY reported_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, description FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_id = 3
SELECT name, gender, age FROM suspects WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM security_cameras WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY installation_date
SELECT name, department FROM security_officers WHERE department = 'Security'
